description: Adds tags to a resource. A tag is a label you can assign to an Amazon Web Services resource. In Glue, you can tag only certain resources. For information about what resources you can tag, see Amazon Web Services Tags in Glue.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the Glue resource to which to add the tags. For more information about Glue resource ARNs, see the Glue ARN string pattern.

parameters.name: TagsToAdd
parameters.description: Tags to add to this resource. (string) --- (string) ---
